vWashington House Rabbit Newsv

Volume 7  Issue 1 March 1998


BEST LITTLE RABBIT RESIDENT,
BERNIE
People walk all over him...and around him (infact he insists on it). He cleans the floors (by eating everything edible that falls on the floor). He works for treat food (by doing little tricks). He is on guard 24 hours a day at the HRS Adoption Center on Lake City Way NE (but spends most of it sleeping). He is Bernard Saint James (but just call him Bernie).

Bernie has been a permanent resident at the Best Little Rabbit Rodent and Ferret House on Lake City Way NE, since it opened over two years ago. In spite of his weeping eyes and bad teeth, he is a very handsome, gentle, and friendly lop that has lived a life of full luxury in the back area of the shelter.
